data.Sentence_cn: 我在一家乡村小酒店吃过午饭后，就找我的提包。
data.Sentence: After I had had lunch at a village pub, I looked for my bag.

data.Sentence_cn: 我曾把它放在门边的椅子上，可这会儿不见了！
data.Sentence: I had left it on a chair beside the door and now it wasn't there!

data.Sentence_cn: 当我正在寻找时，酒店老板走了进来。
data.Sentence: As I was looking for it, the landlord came in.
'Did you have a good meal?' he asked.

data.Sentence_cn: “很好，谢谢。”我回答，“但我付不了帐，我的提包没有了。”
data.Sentence: 'Yes, thank you,' I answered, 'but I can't pay the bill. I haven't got my bag.'

data.Sentence_cn: 酒店老板笑了笑，马上走了出去。
data.Sentence: The landlord smiled and immediately went out.

data.Sentence_cn: 一会儿工夫他拿着我的提包回来了，把它还给了我。
data.Sentence: In a few minutes he returned with my bag and gave it back to me.

data.Sentence_cn: “实在抱歉，”他说，“我的狗把它弄到花园里去了，他常干这种事！”
data.Sentence: 'I'm very sorry,' he said. 'My dog had taken it into the garden. He often does this!'
